@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Andreas Ecker (ecker) Fabian Jakobs (fjakobs) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This is a basic form field with common functionality for {@link TextArea} and {@link TextField}. On every keystroke the value is synchronized with the value of the textfield. Value changes can be monitored by listening to the {@link #input} or {@link #changeValue} events, respectively.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Stylesheet needed to style the native placeholder element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds the CSS rules needed to style the native placeholder element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} initial text value of the input field ({@link #setValue}).
@param.description: initial text value of the input field ({@link #setValue}).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The event is fired on every keystroke modifying the value of the field. The method {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} returns the current value of the text field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The event is fired each time the text field looses focus and the text field values has changed. If you change {@link #liveUpdate} to true, the changeValue event will be fired after every keystroke and not only after every focus loss. In that mode, the changeValue event is equal to the {@link #input} event. The method {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} returns the current text value of the field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Alignment of the text

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the field is read only

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maximal number of characters that can be entered in the TextArea.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the {@link #changeValue} event should be fired on every key input. If set to true, the changeValue event is equal to the {@link #input} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: String value which will be shown as a hint if the field is all of: unset, unfocused and enabled. Set to null to not show a placeholder text.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
RegExp responsible for filtering the value of the textfield. the RegExp gives the range of valid values. Note: The regexp specified is applied to each character in turn, NOT to the entire string. So only regular expressions matching a single character make sense in the context. The following example only allows digits in the textfield. 

field.setFilter(/[0-9]/);

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the input element. Derived classes may override this method, to create different input elements.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.body:
left {Integer} Any integer value for the left position,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any integer value for the left position,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
top {Integer} Any integer value for the top position,
   always in pixels

Any integer value for the top position,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:

   always in pixels

Any positive integer value for the width,
   always in pixels

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
height {Integer} Any positive integer value for the height,
   always in pixels
@param.description:
Any positive integer value for the height,
   always in pixels

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map of which layout sizes changed.
@return.description: A map of which layout sizes changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hook into {@link qx.ui.form.AbstractField#renderLayout} method. Called after the contentElement has a width and an innerWidth. Note: This was introduced to fix BUG#1585

@param.name: @param
@param.body: innerHeight {Integer} The inner height of the element.
@param.description: The inner height of the element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for native input events. Redirects the event to the widget. Also checks for the filter and max length.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Triggers text size recalculation after a web font was loaded

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles the firing of the changeValue event including the local cache for sending the old value in the event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the value of the textfield to the given value.

@description.body: Returns the current value of the textfield.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the value to the default

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the current selection. This method only works if the widget is already created and added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the current selection length. This method only works if the widget is already created and added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the start of the text selection

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer|null} Start of selection or null if not available
@return.description: Start of selection or null if not available

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the end of the text selection

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer|null} End of selection or null if not available
@return.description: End of selection or null if not available

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the selection to the given start and end (zero-based). If no end value is given the selection will extend to the end of the textfield's content. This method only works if the widget is already created and added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clears the current selection. This method only works if the widget is already created and added to the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Selects the whole content

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper to show the placeholder text in the field. It checks for all states and possible conditions and shows the placeholder only if allowed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove the fake placeholder

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper to remove the placeholder. Deletes the placeholder text from the field and removes the state.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the placeholder text with the DOM

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the placeholder label and creates it if necessary.
